1370: Clarebout was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1370.
Got married to Heylewigis at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Heylewigis, Galo, at age 23.
1372: Had a son with Heylewigis, Elyasа, at age 24.
1373: Had a son with Heylewigis, Assceric, at age 25.
1379: Had a son with Heylewigis, Gisekin, at age 31.
1384: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Gheesen, at age 36.
1385: Had a son with Heylewigis, Samuel, at age 37.
1387: Had a son with Heylewigis, Ase, at age 39.
1389: Lost son Elyasа when Elyasа was 18 years old.
Lost son Ase when Ase was 3 years old.
